name: Chicken Shack
description: '''Chicken Shack''' are a [[British blues]] and [[rock music|rock]] band, founded in the mid-1960s by [[Stan Webb (guitarist)|Stan Webb]] (guitar and vocals), [[Andy Silvester]] (bass guitar), and Alan Morley (drums), who were later joined by [[Christine McVie|Christine Perfect]] (later McVie) (vocals and keyboards) in 1967. Chicken Shack has performed with various line-ups, Stan Webb being the only constant member.
